title: Digital Storytelling Workshop for Improving Accessibility to Cultural Heritage

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Proficiency in Digital Device Usage and General Understanding of Cultural Heritage
context.additional_context: Practitioner-focused program emphasizing the design of accessibility improvement solutions applicable in mathematical domains.

learning_goals: Learners can draft storyboards for digital cultural heritage content considering special needs populations
Learners can apply storytelling techniques that reduce cognitive load using smartphone-based tools
Learners can analyze the feasibility of improving accessibility to cultural heritage through project outcome evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
